work 02.

Freely

about.

it turns out planning stuff with friends isn’t always super easy - sometimes no one knows when people are free. I found a comment about it on https://iwishtherewasanappfor.com so I decided to design an app around it.


I teamed up with some friends for the implementation and release, but we’re still working on it.

role.

design lead, principal interaction engineer.
